headline.main: $500,000,000 GOAL SET BY AD COUNCIL; LaRoche Says Quota Is Double Amount Contributed During the Year Just Ended NEW NAME IS SELECTED Group to Open Intensive Drive With Slogan 'A War Message in Every Ad'

lead_paragraph: In announcing a change in name of the Advertising Council yesterday, Chester J. LaRoche, chairman, said the goal set for this year was to double the $250,000,000 contributed by advertisers and media during 1942 to explain the war to the people.
abstract: C J LaRoche announces War Ad Council '43 plans
snippet: In announcing a change in name of the Advertising Council yesterday, Chester J. LaRoche, chairman, said the goal set for this year was to double the $250,000,000 contributed by advertisers and media during 1942 to explain the war to the people....
